name: Ju no ai
description:
Japan year 20XX People lost love and are like zombies.
As a last man with a heart in your mission is to fill them with bullets created from your feelings
PS: You use a shotgun and grenades

Controls: Gamepad

Game Jam: Warsaw Film School Game Jam 2017
Jam Year: 2016
Game JamTheme: Love
Platforms: MS Windows, Mac OS X, Linux / Unix, Web standard (HTML5, Java, JavaScript, Flash)
Tools And Technologies: Construct 2

Credits:

Bartłomiej "Saper" Czarnak - Designe, Code, Graphics
Tobiasz "Unfa" Karoń - Music and Sound Effects
